tool_description: BulkDemand API forecasts the demand for many products (up to 100) for the given number of days based on past sales or consumption.
name: BulkDemand
title: BulkDemand

api_list.name: BulkDemand
api_list.description: Demand url inputs in json format for multiple products.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bulkdemand.p.rapidapi.com/demandmultiple"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bulkdemand.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bulkdemand.p.rapidapi.com/demandmultiple"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bulkdemand.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
